interfaces

Interface RuleInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Rule

    public interface RuleInterface
    An interface that is used by the rule class to guarantee that every rule has necessary methods
    Author:
    jdk85

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String[] getChannels()
      Getter for a list of channels associated with the rule
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Getter for a description of the rule This is used by the web interface info button
      boolean getIsRunning()
      Getter returns true if the rule is running (ON) or false if it is paused (OFF)
      java.lang.String getName()
      Getter for the rule name that also functions as display name
      java.lang.String isRunningString()
      Getter returns a string (in HTML) representation of the rule state This is used by the web interface to display the rule state
      void setDescription(java.lang.String str)
      Setter method for the rule description
      void setIsRunning(boolean b)
      Setter method to set rule state
      void setName(java.lang.String str)
      Setter method to set the display name of the rule
      void toggleRule()
      This method checks the rule state and toggles running/not running.

        Getter returns true if the rule is running (ON) or false if it is paused (OFF)
        Returns:
        Boolean running state of the rule

        Getter returns a string (in HTML) representation of the rule state This is used by the web interface to display the rule state

        String representation of rule state
